overview: Where else in the world would you encounter hot, steamy, dark muscled guys ready and willing to show you everything they have? Where else in the world are poolside orgies commonplace? Shot entirely in Rio de Janiero where hot 'n steamy don't just refer to the weather. Uninhibited sex is freely displayed, flaunted and encouraged in that famous Brazilian candid style. Five amazing scenes filled with a spectrum of skin colors, sweat, and man cream! Damn...do they ever stop it?
title: Poolside Heat
